thread.section_title: Les Tournelles - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect location
thread.title_full: Perfect location - Review of Les Tournelles, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Kate W
title: Perfect location
text: A great little hotel in a really perfect location. There are loads of lovely shops, galleries and cafes right on the door step. The Marais is such a lovely area and the hotel was really easy to reach on the metro from the Gard de Nord. I went with my 16 year old daughter and she loved it as much a I did. The room was clean and cosy and, having walked miles around Paris during the day, it was perfect to be able to find a good brasserie for supper only 100 yards away. A great place to stay.
